name: Ceramic Crashers
description:
I made this game with the help of a good friend in about a week. It is a game about mugs fighting pots.  See how many rounds you can go and how many areas you can overtake.

Use the WASD keys to control the Blue Mug. LCTRL for punch. LSHIFT to grab. 

Use the Directional keys to control the Red Mug. RCTRL for punch. RSHIFT for grab.

You have a small grab space area, and a longer punch. However, the punches can only be thrown when a grey ball is not present. Also, you can hurl your flower pot at other flower pots, destroying two.

It's 6:32. I'm going to bed.
